name: Spelling (Barnaby Games)
description: Spelling is a TTRPG about the use of words and their power. You play a Speller a person gifted the ability to speak the Words of Fae. 20 words that act as spells in the world of men. Spellers protect the world from cryptids, dangers and intruders to the world. There are few who speak all 20 words but for most a few words are more than enough to defend this world.
